Timor Leste.description-country: Timor-Leste, also known as East Timor, is a small country in Southeast Asia. It is located on the eastern half of the island of Timor and is known for its rugged terrain and rich cultural heritage.

Turkmenistan.description-country: Turkmenistan is a country in Central Asia. It is known for its extensive natural gas reserves and its elaborate monuments and buildings, many of which were built during the rule of former President Saparmurat Niyazov.
Turkmenistan.description-city: Ashgabat is the capital and largest city of Turkmenistan. It is located in the south-central part of the country and has a population of around 1.2 million people.

Tunisia.description-country: Tunisia is a country in North Africa. It is known for its Mediterranean beaches, ancient ruins, and bustling markets.
Tunisia.description-city: Tunis is the capital and largest city of Tunisia. It is located on the northeast coast of the country and has a population of around 2.3 million people.

Tonga.description-country: Tonga is a Polynesian kingdom located in the South Pacific Ocean. It is known for its beautiful beaches, tropical climate, and friendly people.
Tonga.description-city: Nuku'alofa is the capital and largest city of Tonga. It is located on the northern coast of the island of Tongatapu and has a population of around 25,000 people.

Turkey.description-country: Turkey is a country located in both Europe and Asia. It is known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and beautiful landscapes, including the famous Cappadocia region.
Turkey.description-city: Ankara is the capital of Turkey. It is located in the central part of the country and has a population of around 5.6 million people.

Trinidad and Tobago.description-country: Trinidad and Tobago is a dual-island Caribbean nation known for its diverse culture, cuisine, and Carnival celebrations. It is home to beautiful beaches, coral reefs, and lush rainforests.
Trinidad and Tobago.description-city: Port of Spain is the capital and largest city of Trinidad and Tobago. It is a hub of business, government, and culture, and is famous for its lively Carnival celebrations.

Tuvalu.description-country: Tuvalu is a small island nation located in the Pacific Ocean. It is made up of nine coral atolls and is known for its beautiful beaches and unique culture.
Tuvalu.description-city: Funafuti is the capital and largest city of Tuvalu. It is located on the atoll of Funafuti and has a population of around 6,000 people.

Taiwan.description-country: Taiwan is a sovereign state in East Asia known for its bustling cities, beautiful landscapes, and delicious cuisine. It is home to over 23 million people and has a rich cultural heritage.
Taiwan.description-city: Taipei is the capital and largest city of Taiwan. It is a major center for business, culture, and technology, and is known for its iconic Taipei 101 skyscraper.

Tanzania.description-country: Tanzania is an East African country known for its vast wilderness areas, including the Serengeti National Park and Mount Kilimanjaro. It is home to over 60 million people and has a diverse cultural heritage.
Tanzania.description-city: Dodoma is the capital city of Tanzania, but Dar es Salaam is the largest city and the commercial center of the country.

Ukraine.description-country: Ukraine is a large country in Eastern Europe known for its rich history, cultural heritage, and beautiful landscapes. It is home to over 42 million people and has a diverse economy.
Ukraine.description-city: Kyiv is the capital and largest city of Ukraine. It is a major center for business, culture, and education, and is home to many historic landmarks.

Uganda.description-country: Uganda is a landlocked country in East Africa known for its diverse wildlife, including mountain gorillas, chimpanzees, and various bird species. It is home to over 45 million people and has a rich cultural heritage.
Uganda.description-city: Kampala is the capital and largest city of Uganda. It is a major center for business, culture, and education, and is known for its vibrant nightlife and music scene.

United States Minor Outlying Islands.description-country: The United States Minor Outlying Islands are a group of nine islands and atolls in the Pacific and Indian Oceans. The islands have no permanent population and are mostly uninhabited, except for the military personnel and scientists stationed there.
United States Minor Outlying Islands.description-city: There is no official capital of the United States Minor Outlying Islands.

United States.description-country: The United States of America is a federal republic consisting of 50 states, a federal district (Washington, D.C.), and five major territories. The country is known for its diverse culture, world-renowned landmarks, and global economic influence.
United States.description-city: Washington, D.C. is the capital city of the United States and is located on the east coast of the country. It is known for its iconic landmarks, such as the White House and the National Mall.

Uruguay.description-country: Uruguay is a country located in southeastern South America. It is known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and political stability. Uruguay is also the world's leading producer of wool.
Uruguay.description-city: Montevideo is the capital and largest city of Uruguay. It is located on the country's southern coast and has a population of around 1.3 million people.

Uzbekistan.description-country: Uzbekistan is a landlocked country in Central Asia, known for its rich history and diverse cultural heritage. The country is home to many ancient cities, including Samarkand and Bukhara, which are renowned for their architectural beauty.
Uzbekistan.description-city: Tashkent is the capital and largest city of Uzbekistan. It is located in the northeastern part of the country and has a population of over 2.5 million people.

Vatican.description-country: The Vatican City is a sovereign city-state enclaved within Rome, Italy. It is the smallest country in the world, both in terms of area and population, and is the spiritual and administrative center of the Roman Catholic Church.
Vatican.description-city: The Vatican City is the de facto capital of the Vatican City State.

Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.description-country: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines is an island country in the Caribbean. It is known for its white sandy beaches, crystal-clear waters, and lush rainforests. The country is also a popular destination for sailing and yachting enthusiasts.
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.description-city: Kingstown is the capital and largest city of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. It is located on the southern coast of the main island and has a population of around 16,000 people.

Venezuela.description-country: Venezuela is a country in South America known for its diverse culture, natural beauty, and rich history. The country is home to Angel Falls, the highest waterfall in the world, and is known for its delicious cuisine and vibrant music.
Venezuela.description-city: Caracas is the capital and largest city of Venezuela. It is located in the northern part of the country and has a population of over 2 million people.

British Virgin Islands.description-country: The British Virgin Islands are a group of islands located in the Caribbean Sea. The islands are known for their beautiful beaches, crystal-clear waters, and great opportunities for sailing and snorkeling.
British Virgin Islands.description-city: Road Town is the capital and largest city of the British Virgin Islands. It is located on the island of Tortola and has a population of around 10,000 people.

U.S. Virgin Islands.description-country: The U.S. Virgin Islands are a group of islands located in the Caribbean Sea. The islands are known for their beautiful beaches, crystal-clear waters, and great opportunities for sailing and snorkeling.
U.S. Virgin Islands.description-city: Charlotte Amalie is the capital and largest city of the U.S. Virgin Islands. It is located on the island of Saint Thomas and has a population of around 19,000 people.

Vietnam.description-country: Vietnam is a country in Southeast Asia known for its stunning natural beauty, ancient history, and delicious cuisine. The country is home to many beautiful beaches, mountain ranges, and national parks.
Vietnam.description-city: Hanoi is the capital and second-largest city of Vietnam. It is located in the northern part of the country and has a population of around 7.6 million people.

Vanuatu.description-country: Vanuatu is an island country located in the South Pacific Ocean. The country is known for its stunning natural beauty, including active volcanoes, pristine beaches, and coral reefs.
Vanuatu.description-city: Port Vila is the capital and largest city of Vanuatu. It is located on the island of Efate and has a population of around 44,000 people.

Wallis and Futuna.description-country: Wallis and Futuna is a French overseas collectivity located in the South Pacific Ocean. The collectivity is made up of three main islands and several smaller ones, and is known for its beautiful lagoons, coral reefs, and unique culture.
Wallis and Futuna.description-city: Mata-Utu is the capital and largest city of Wallis and Futuna. It is located on the island of Uvea and has a population of around 1,200 people.

Samoa.description-country: Samoa is an island country located in the South Pacific Ocean. It is known for its beautiful beaches, lush rainforests, and vibrant Polynesian culture.
Samoa.description-city: The capital city of Samoa is Apia. It is located on the island of Upolu and has a population of around 36,000 people.

Kosovo.description-country: Kosovo is a partially recognized country located in the Balkan Peninsula of Europe. It is known for its rich history and cultural heritage, as well as its beautiful natural landscapes.
Kosovo.description-city: The capital city of Kosovo is Pristina. It is the largest city in Kosovo and has a population of around 180,000 people.

Yemen.description-country: Yemen is a country located in the Arabian Peninsula of Southwest Asia. It is known for its ancient history, cultural heritage, and beautiful landscapes.
Yemen.description-city: The capital city of Yemen is Sana'a. It is one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world and has a population of around 2.5 million people.

Mayotte.description-country: Mayotte is an overseas department and region of France located in the Indian Ocean. It is known for its beautiful beaches, coral reefs, and unique flora and fauna.
Mayotte.description-city: The capital city of Mayotte is Mamoudzou. It is the largest city in Mayotte and has a population of around 60,000 people.

South Africa.description-country: South Africa is a country located at the southern tip of the African continent. It is known for its diverse population, wildlife, and scenic landscapes, such as Table Mountain and Kruger National Park.
South Africa.description-city: Pretoria is one of the three capital cities of South Africa, along with Cape Town and Bloemfontein. It is located in the northern part of the country and has a population of over 2 million people.

Zambia.description-country: Zambia is a landlocked country in southern Africa, known for its wildlife, such as elephants, lions, and hippos, as well as its natural landmarks, such as Victoria Falls and Lake Kariba.
Zambia.description-city: Lusaka is the capital and largest city of Zambia, located in the southern part of the country. It has a population of over 1.8 million people.

Zimbabwe.description-country: Zimbabwe is a landlocked country located in southern Africa. It is known for its wildlife, such as elephants, lions, and buffalo, as well as its historic landmarks, such as Great Zimbabwe and the ruins of the ancient city of Khami.
Zimbabwe.description-city: Harare is the capital and largest city of Zimbabwe, located in the northeast part of the country. It has a population of over 1.6 million people.
